TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi beforefieldinit ExceptionHandlingClause extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示结构化异常处理块中的子句。

span.span: Represents a clause in a structured exception-handling block.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供有关 `try`...`catch`...`finally` 中的子句的信息The class provides information about the clauses in a `try`…`catch`…`finally` block （`Try`...`Catch`...`Finally`block (`Try`…`Catch`…`Finally` 在 Visual Basic 中）。in Visual Basic). 若要获取方法中的异常处理子句列表，请获取表示方法的 。To get a list of exception-handling clauses in a method, obtain a that represents the method. 使用 方法获取 对象，然后使用 属性获取子句的列表。Use the method to obtain a object, and then use the property to get the list of clauses. > [!NOTE] > 使用异常处理子句需要透彻地理解元数据和 Microsoft 中间语言（MSIL）指令格式。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats. 有关信息，请参阅公共语言基础结构（CLI）文档，尤其是 "第二部分：元数据定义和语义" 和 "第三部分： CIL 指令集"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为 `MethodBodyExample`的测试方法，并显示其本地变量信息和异常处理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample`, and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用于获取测试方法的 对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 属性用于获取 对象的列表并显示其属性。The property is used to obtain a list of objects and display their properties. 您可以使用 Ildasm 检查已编译代码示例的 MSIL，以查看如何计算偏移量和长度。You can use Ildasm.exe to examine the MSIL for the compiled code example, to see how the offsets and lengths are calculated. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有计算机语言都可以生成 子句。Not all computer languages can generate clauses. Visual Basic 示例显示一个筛选器子句，该子句使用 Visual Basic `When` 表达式，这在其他语言的示例中是省略的。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. 此代码是位于 类主题中的更大示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger example located in the class topic. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#7)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数由派生类在构造 对象的过程中调用。This constructor is invoked by derived classes during the construction of objects.

Public ReadOnly Property CatchType As Type

summary.span: 获取由此子句处理的异常类型。

span.span: Gets the type of exception handled by this clause.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象表示此子句处理的异常类型，如果 属性 或 ，则 。

span.span: A object that represents that type of exception handled by this clause, or if the property is or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 使用异常处理子句需要透彻地理解元数据和 Microsoft 中间语言（MSIL）指令格式。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats. 有关信息，请参阅公共语言基础结构（CLI）文档，尤其是 "第二部分：元数据定义和语义" 和 "第三部分： CIL 指令集"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为 `MethodBodyExample`的测试方法，并显示其本地变量信息和异常处理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample`, and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用于获取测试方法的 对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 属性用于获取 对象的列表并显示其属性。The property is used to obtain a list of objects and display their properties. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有计算机语言都可以生成 子句。Not all computer languages can generate clauses. Visual Basic 示例显示一个筛选器子句，该子句使用 Visual Basic `When` 表达式，这在其他语言的示例中是省略的。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. 此代码是位于 类主题中的更大示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger example located in the class topic. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#7)]

exception.span: 不能将属性用于对象的当前状态。

span.span: Invalid use of property for the object's current state.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property FilterOffset As Integer
public: virtual property int FilterOffset { int get(); };
Public ReadOnly Property FilterOffset As Integer
public: property int FilterOffset { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取用户提供的筛选代码在方法体内的偏移量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets the offset within the method body, in bytes, of the user-supplied filter code.

value.span: 用户提供的筛选器代码在方法体内的偏移量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The offset within the method body, in bytes, of the user-supplied filter code.

value.span: 如果 属性包含除 以外的任何值，则此属性的值没有任何意义。

span.span: The value of this property has no meaning if the property has any value other than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 筛选子句包含用户 suppliedMicrosoft 中间语言（MSIL），该语言确定是否通过此子句来处理异常。A filter clause contains user-suppliedMicrosoft intermediate language (MSIL) that determines whether an exception is handled by this clause. 例如，包含 Visual Basic `When` 关键字的任何子句都是 子句。For example, any clause containing the Visual Basic `When` keyword is a clause. > [!NOTE] > 使用异常处理子句需要全面了解元数据和 MSIL 指令格式。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and MSIL instruction formats. 有关信息，请参阅公共语言基础结构（CLI）文档，尤其是 "第二部分：元数据定义和语义" 和 "第三部分： CIL 指令集"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

exception.span: 由于异常处理子句不是一个筛选器，因此无法获取偏移量。

span.span: Cannot get the offset because the exception handling clause is not a filter.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Flags As ExceptionHandlingClauseOptions
Public ReadOnly Property Flags As ExceptionHandlingClauseOptions

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示此异常处理子句是 finally 子句、类型筛选的子句还是用户筛选的子句。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether this exception-handling clause is a finally clause, a type-filtered clause, or a user-filtered clause.

value.span: 一个 值，该值指示此子句执行的操作类型。

span.span: An value that indicates what kind of action this clause performs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 使用异常处理子句需要透彻地理解元数据和 Microsoft 中间语言（MSIL）指令格式。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats. 有关信息，请参阅公共语言基础结构（CLI）文档，尤其是 "第二部分：元数据定义和语义" 和 "第三部分： CIL 指令集"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为 `MethodBodyExample`的测试方法，并显示其本地变量信息和异常处理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample`, and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用于获取测试方法的 对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 属性用于获取 对象的列表并显示其属性。The property is used to obtain a list of objects and display their properties. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有计算机语言都可以生成 子句。Not all computer languages can generate clauses. Visual Basic 示例显示一个筛选器子句，该子句使用 Visual Basic `When` 表达式，这在其他语言的示例中是省略的。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. 此代码是位于 类主题中的更大示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger example located in the class topic. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#7)]

summary.span: 获取此异常处理子句的主体的长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets the length, in bytes, of the body of this exception-handling clause.

value.span: 一个整数，表示构成此异常处理子句的主体的 MSIL 的长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: An integer that represents the length, in bytes, of the MSIL that forms the body of this exception-handling clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 使用异常处理子句需要透彻地理解元数据和 Microsoft 中间语言（MSIL）指令格式。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats. 有关信息，请参阅公共语言基础结构（CLI）文档，尤其是 "第二部分：元数据定义和语义" 和 "第三部分： CIL 指令集"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为 `MethodBodyExample`的测试方法，并显示其本地变量信息和异常处理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample`, and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用于获取测试方法的 对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 属性用于获取 对象的列表并显示其属性。The property is used to obtain a list of objects and display their properties. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有计算机语言都可以生成 子句。Not all computer languages can generate clauses. Visual Basic 示例显示一个筛选器子句，该子句使用 Visual Basic `When` 表达式，这在其他语言的示例中是省略的。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. 此代码是位于 类主题中的更大示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger example located in the class topic. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#7)]

summary.span: 包括此异常处理子句的 try 块的总长度（以字节为单位）。

value.span: 包括此异常处理子句的 try 块的总长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The total length, in bytes, of the try block that includes this exception-handling clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个整数，表示包括此异常处理子句的 try 块的总长度（以字节为单位）。An integer that represents the total length, in bytes, of the try block that includes this exception-handling clause. > [!NOTE] > 使用异常处理子句需要透彻地理解元数据和 Microsoft 中间语言（MSIL）指令格式。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats. 有关信息，请参阅公共语言基础结构（CLI）文档，尤其是 "第二部分：元数据定义和语义" 和 "第三部分： CIL 指令集"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为 `MethodBodyExample`的测试方法，并显示其本地变量信息和异常处理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample`, and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用于获取测试方法的 对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 属性用于获取 对象的列表并显示其属性。The property is used to obtain a list of objects and display their properties. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有计算机语言都可以生成 子句。Not all computer languages can generate clauses. Visual Basic 示例显示一个筛选器子句，该子句使用 Visual Basic `When` 表达式，这在其他语言的示例中是省略的。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. 此代码是位于 类主题中的更大示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger example located in the class topic. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property TryOffset As Integer
public: virtual property int TryOffset { int get(); };
Public ReadOnly Property TryOffset As Integer
public: property int TryOffset { int get(); };

summary.span: 包括此异常处理子句的 try 块在方法内的偏移量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The offset within the method, in bytes, of the try block that includes this exception-handling clause.

value.span: 一个整数，表示包含此异常处理子句的 try 块在方法内的偏移量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: An integer that represents the offset within the method, in bytes, of the try block that includes this exception-handling clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 使用异常处理子句需要透彻地理解元数据和 Microsoft 中间语言（MSIL）指令格式。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats. 有关信息，请参阅公共语言基础结构（CLI）文档，尤其是 "第二部分：元数据定义和语义" 和 "第三部分： CIL 指令集"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为 `MethodBodyExample`的测试方法，并显示其本地变量信息和异常处理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample`, and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用于获取测试方法的 对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 属性用于获取 对象的列表并显示其属性。The property is used to obtain a list of objects and display their properties. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有计算机语言都可以生成 子句。Not all computer languages can generate clauses. Visual Basic 示例显示一个筛选器子句，该子句使用 Visual Basic `When` 表达式，这在其他语言的示例中是省略的。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. 此代码是位于 类主题中的更大示例的一部分。This code is part of a larger example located in the class topic. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#7)]
